key.name: mac-address
key.summary: The MAC address of your Soundcore headphones.
key.description: This key manages the MAC address of your Soundcore headphones. Without it, Noiseclapper cannot function.

key.name: position
key.description: Side of the panel where the Noiseclapper icon will be displayed (left/center/right).

key.name: position-number
key.summary: Position of the Noiseclapper icon in the chosen panel side.

key.name: terminal-enabled
key.description: If this key is enabled, Noiseclapper will use the gnome-terminal.

key.name: python-type
key.summary: Sets the python binary name to use for your system.
